actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide for establishment of mass transit transportation for certain military personnel, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Navy to establish a mass transit system for transporting military personnel whose duty assignment is the Naval Submarine Support Base, Kings Bay, Georgia, to and from their residences on a non-fare charging basis.

titles.title: A bill to provide for establishment of mass transit transportation for certain military personnel, and for other purposes.
